text: neohoega yeohaengjung-igeona seogi leul balgyeonhaji moshal gyeong-u sintag-eul hamyeon joghanila seologa sinloe hal su issdamyeon sutagjalo hayeogeum geuui wi tag-eul cheolihadolog hago geulo hayeo geum hananim-eul gong-gyeonghadolog hala geu ligo jung-eon-eul gamchuji malla geugeos-eun sumgineun jamada geuui ma-eum-eun joeag eulo eollugjige doenila hananim-eun neohoedeul-i haenghan modeun geos-eul algo gyesinila
